results.title: CCCT - Funding - CCITLA - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI’s Cancer Clinical Investigator Team Leadership Awards (CCITLAs) recognize mid-career clinical investigators at NCI Cancer Centers.

results.title: CCCT - Special Funding - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Funding opportunities for biomarker, imaging, quality of life and cost effectiveness studies (BIQSFP) and mid-career clinical investigators (CCITLA)

results.title: CCCT - Funding - BIQSFP - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Funding for NCTN and NCORP Research Bases to support biomarker, imaging, quality of life and symptom science/QOL studies (BIQSFP) associated with network trials.

results.title: CCCT - Coordinating Center for Clinical Trials - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The Coordinating Center for Clinical Trials (CCCT) plays a key role in supporting NCI’s clinical and translational research programs to advance science and patient care.

results.title: Microsoft Word - Program Guidelines for FY21 CCITLA P30 Administrative Supplement_Final_v3
CCCT - About - National Cancer Institute
results.description: An overview of how the Coordinating Center for Clinical Trials supports NCI's clinical trials and translational research enterprises. Includes CCCT contact information.

results.title: CCCT - CTAC - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Clinical Trials and Translational Research Advisory Committee, CTAC, is an external oversight committee that advises NCI leadership on its clinical and translational research enterprises.

results.title: CCCT - Resources - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Find standardized case reporting forms (CRFs) and standard terms of agreement for research trial (START) clauses.

results.title: Recipients of CCITLA Announced - National Cancer Institute
results.description: NCI’s Cancer Clinical Investigator Team Leadership Awards recognize and support outstanding mid-career clinical investigators at NCI-Designated Cancer Centers who participate extensively in NCI-funded collaborative clinical trials and whose leadership, pa

results.title: CCCT - Contact and Staff Information - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Contact and staff information for NCI's Coordinating Center for Clinical Trials (CCCT).

results.title: CCCT - Cancer Prevention Steering Committee - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The Cancer Prevention Steering Committee reviews innovative cancer prevention, screening, and surveillance concepts.

results.title: CCCT - NCORP Cancer Control Steering Committees - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Information about Cancer Care Delivery Research (CCDR) and Symptom Management and Health-Related Quality of Life (SxQOL) Steering Committees, including membership, clinical trial planning meetings, publications and approved trials conducted through NCORP.

results.title: CCCT - Scientific Steering Committees - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A functional overview of NCI's Scientific Steering Committees (SSCs). SSCs are tasked with evaluating and prioritizing clinical trials based on scientific merit in a transparent process.

results.title: CCCT - Patient Advocate Steering Committee - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The Patient Advocate Steering Committee (PASC) works to ensure advocates involved with the Scientific Steering Committees (SSCs) are completely integrated in the development, implementation, and monitoring of clinical trials within those groups.

results.title: CCCT - NCTN Steering Committees - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The National Clinical Trials Network (NCTN) Steering Committees review concepts, or proposals, for large phase 2 or phase 3 treatment or imaging trials conducted in the NCTN.

results.title: CCCT - NCTN Steering Committees - Genitourinary Cancers - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The Genitourinary Cancers Steering Committee evaluates and prioritizes concepts for phase 3 and large phase 2 therapeutic clinical trials in genitourinary cancers.

results.title: CCCT - Cancer Care Delivery Research Steering Committee - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The Cancer Care Delivery Research (CCDR) Steering Committee evaluates and prioritizes cancer care delivery research study concepts for trials conducted through NCORP.

results.title: CCCT - NCTN Steering Committees - Gynecologic Cancers - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The Gynecologic Cancers Steering Committee evaluates and prioritizes concepts for phase 2 and 3 clinical trials in adult gynecologic cancers. The GCSC is also intent on fostering collaboration with international groups and institutions conducting trials.

results.title: CCCT - CTRP - System Access and Training - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Find Clinical Trials Reporting Program (CTRP) user guides, resources, and contact information.

results.title: CCCT - NCTN Steering Committees - Myeloma - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The Myeloma Steering Committee evaluates and prioritizes concepts for phase 3 and large phase 2 therapeutic clinical trials.
